title.slogan: Delivering Industrial Digitalization with Cybernetics Expertise

items.title: About Us
content: Our team includes engineers with strong backgrounds in cybernetics, robotics, and industrial IT. We have solid expertise in automation systems, covering both Operational Technology (OT) and Information Technology (IT) aspects. Whether it's developing embedded software, designing control systems, working on cloud solutions, or managing frontend development, we can handle it. We also excel in managing large amounts of timeseries data and applying machine learning and AI technologies.

items.title: Project Experience
content: Our team's wide-ranging industry experience equips us to deliver innovative solutions in various sectors. Examples include: Maritime Operations, Oil & Gas, Aquaculture, Construction, Carbon Capture, Batteries, Shipyards, Electronics, Semiconductors, Agriculture, Wastewater Treatment, Fertilizer Production, and Seaweed Farming.

sections.content: Digel is working with Aker Solutions to advance engineering processes, particularly in the design of stair towers for offshore installations.

sections.title: Project Overview
sections.content: The project utilizes Python and the ParaPy framework to automate the complex design process of these stair towers, significantly accelerating the development from weeks to minutes. This application ensures that each stair tower is not only structurally sound but also ergonomically designed to facilitate easy and safe usage by offshore personnel. The application interfaces seamlessly with E3D from Aveva, a 3D design software for process and power plants.

sections.title: Digel's Role
sections.content: Our contribution extends beyond software development to include project management, leveraging our in-depth industrial knowledge to address specific engineering challenges effectively. This project exemplifies our ability to integrate advanced technology solutions within traditional industries.

img.caption: 'It is inherent in Digel's nature to engage in processes that drive disruptive changes in industrial operations', says Christoffer, reflecting on the core philosophy that guides our work.

sections.title: Conclusion
sections.content: The collaborative efforts between Digel and Aker Solutions demonstrate the benefits of applying modern software solutions to streamline complex engineering tasks, setting new standards for efficiency and innovation in the industry.
